input: Batch request to fetch mandates with 'Recurring' SEPA sequence type and 'Active' status.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /DirectDebitMandates?$filter=DirectDebitCollectionSEPASequenceTypeName eq 'Recurring' and UserStatusCode eq '2' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--
